These Texts|

Information

These Texts is a collection of messages I’ve received from people I know, or knew at some point. The messages are organized chronically—each one roughly representing 1 week from the last three years.

The project is roughly inspired by Jamie Livingston, Miranda July, and the slew of similar works already out there.

Oct 19, 2016, 8:14 PM

Hey! It's Mark with Hillary and California Democrats. We only have a few weeks left to talk to voters and we need you. Can you come in to volunteer?

Sep 14, 2016, 10:48 PM

We could hold each other til we fall asleep

Or we could fuck like mad and pass out sweaty and happy
